Hi, I’m Amanda

I create meaningful digital experiences that seamlessly blend analytical thinking with visual storytelling. With expertise in strategic design, micro-interactions, and digital accessibility (WCAG), I deliver comprehensive solutions across the entire product development lifecycle. From discovery and user interface design to implementing production-ready products using no-code/low-code platforms, my approach is both versatile and thorough.

Grounded in design best practices, I leverage these principles to drive strategic thinking and make informed decisions that elevate every project. My work focuses on creating intuitive, accessible, and impactful digital experiences that resonate with users while meeting business objectives.

My design journey

My design journey has been anything but conventional. From the early days of exploring creativity with crayons to diving into the structured world of engineering, my path has been a unique blend of curiosity and discovery, ultimately leading me to UX/UI design.

A pivotal moment of self-discovery ignited my passion for design. Starting with graphic design, I built a strong foundation in visual aesthetics and communication. This exploration quickly evolved into a deep love for digital design, where I found my true calling. Today, as a UX/UI designer, I take pride in the non-linear path that brought me here and the experiences that have shaped my approach to design
